website_summaries.verdict: K-Swiss brought back its court-style classic, the low-top ST329 and traded the customary sock liner with a Comfort Memory Foam which gained the approval of sneaker lovers and followers of this style. Repeat buyers considered such added feature a plus factor in achieving all-day ultimate foot comfort. Its well-made leather cover tends to be stiff right off the box, but it becomes pliable through constant use. With its budget-friendly cost, some didn’t have second thoughts in buying one or more pairs.
pros: The K-Swiss ST329 CMF is highly recommended by several satisfied buyers
Many were pleased with the cushioning offered by the Comfort Memory Foam
Most reviewers were pleased with its fit especially after giving its leather upper adequate break-in time
A couple of buyers emphasized that the lace-up feature allowed them to buckle down and achieve a comfortable fit
Many appreciated the quality of the leather it provides as it lasted them over a year
Some of those who approved of the ST329 CMF’s shock-absorbing features kept one or more pairs in their sneaker closet
A wearer who has a gout problem and needed superbly supported kicks was thrilled with this shoe and used it several days a week
A critic praised its aesthetics as it doesn’t look masculine for the woman’s feet
A good number of broad footed wearers gave this kick a high rating
It met the expectations of plenty of users regarding style
As noted by some, its super thick sole with distinct lugs grants traction
cons: Quite several reviewers mentioned that it would have been advantageous if the Comfort Memory Foam is removable and not glued on the shoe
Some complained that this kick is somewhat more massive than expected
Several users noted that it’s stiff right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Scratched and dirty
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these because they don't sell them in town anymore. I assumed they were going to be in brand new condition but they're dirty, scratched, peeling, glue stuck on them and you can't pick it off without taking the white of the shoe off now and loose threads from the memory foam is unravelling. My husband hasn't tried them on yet will update....he tried them on and said they'll do but doesnt think theyll last 5 months
customer_reviews.author: POCKETFULLOFPOSES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars From Me
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever review...but I feel strongly about this product. I am diabetic and have problems with foot pain (neuropathy). I have been searching for awhile for everyday casual shoes that fit and feel good. I was reluctant to order shoes on line as my experience in the past has not been good. I'm glad I took a chance with the k-Swiss ST329. This shoe is like walking on pillows. I am going to order a second pair in a different color. Five stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: R Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing looks, may need insoles
customer_reviews.text: These are the best looking shoes around...but they are not as comfortable as they use to be. The memory foam insole sounds like a good idea, but for me, it just does not work. After a couple days the insole had a permanent depression in the ball of the foot area and this created a very uncomfortable shoe. So, be prepared to purchase some insoles for these shoes. I've had this same shoe in the past, and they should go back to how they use to make them. They look great though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: As uncomfortable as a shoe could possibly be
customer_reviews.text: How anyone could like how these fit is beyond my comprehension. The "memory foam" in them feels like a large rock in the arch. It literally hurts just to stand. In addition, the material where the top eyelets are for the laces, it is extremely hard material and doesn't bend. Instead of making it shorter, so that you can bend your foot up with comfort, they didn't. Instead of making it longer, so that the material is higher on your ankle, so that you can bend your foot up with comfort, they didn't. To make a "long" story "short," these shoes suck. But hey, they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: LifeLongLearner

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are nice but I got a used one. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The moment I opened the box, I thought that the shoes looked nice. But when I closer examined the shoes, I realized that it has been used. The bottom of the shoes had been slightly used due to the flaying of rubber. The material around the ankle of the shoes are discolored as if it had absorbed the colors of pants, socks or what ever. Instead of the entire material around the ankle being white and clean, its brownish and black. The shoe was well taken care by the previous owner but it's still friggin used and I was expecting a new one.
customer_reviews.author: EEEE

customer_reviews.title: ... Swiss shoes and will say that this pair is perfect for the problems I have due to my disability
customer_reviews.text: I have several styles of K Swiss shoes and will say that this pair is perfect for the problems I have due to my disability. I have metal that covers parts of my spine and hip problems that make walking difficult for me, but now with the foam technology in these shoes I can walk a little farther with very little pain to my lower back. These have to be one of the most comfortable shoes I have owned and would recommend them to anyone that has problems with their back and legs or your hip. Love the style and the look when I put them on. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement pair for my husband’s work shoes, his previous were the same shoe but all black. I received the order quickly, however after just 9 days of wear in an office environment, the soles are separating from the shoe. This was something that took almost a year to happen with his last pair. Basically wasted $57 and now have to find another new pair of work shoes for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Val Chrza

customer_reviews.title: Owed K-Swiss before love them then love them now
customer_reviews.text: I really like how these shoes fit and the style. I've owned these shoes years ago and finally retired them as my mow the grass shoes LOL. Not one rip in the leather all laces straps held eyelets perfect and the souls never cracked. Really high quality shoes in my opinion. I would definitely recommend to others. I think that these do run somewhat on the smaller size I usually wear a 10 and these are 91/2
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this style K-Swiss for many years and have always found them to be a high quality shoe. But something has changed. First of all, I think then pair I was sent were returns as there was slight wear dirt on sole. The shoes just seem cheap. Previous shoes have been soft thick comfortable leather, these feel like plastic. They squeak worse than any other shoe I have owned. I have worn these since July and they STILL squeak. These could be counterfeit, but I really can't say. If this is the new K-Swiss way of manufacturing, it will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: M. Attebury

customer_reviews.title: Great Men's Nursing Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very sturdy and take a while to get broken in, but they provide great support for your entire foot. I wear them continuously for about 13 hours each shift (mostly standing and walking on hard floors) with compression socks and my feet don't get hot or sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: One of the worse shoes I've ever bought. I really gave these a chance and even put insoles in them hoping they would be more comfortable. The shoe is stiff and has very little cushioning in them. I wore them 3 times and each time by the end of the day my feet and knees were killing me. I thought from the reviews that this shoe was for me but sad to say they failed miserably
customer_reviews.author: cJs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish and the fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Comfortable, stylish, and the fit is perfect - even with Dr. Scholl's Arch support inserts in the shoes! The Orthotic inserts won't be necessary, - they are optional, but for me, they elevate comfort to a whole new level as do these shoes!!! I have worn these K-Swiss Sneakers to work, to the gym, and while running errands; they have great traction, an ankle stabilizing effect, and I have gotten no less than 10 comments in a week on how nice they look!!! Also, These are the Perfect Nursing Shoes @ 1/2 the price of traditional RN Work shoes- seriously consider getting a pair whether your a Nurse or not!
customer_reviews.author: Randy A. Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my husband. He put them on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He put them on and after taking 3 steps, said "I'm ready to go out and conquer the world now." I think he likes them. He's an RN and on his feet for 13 hour shifts. Since he started wearing them, he no longer has feet/leg pain at the end of the day. He highly recommends these shoes. I really think he would choose these shoes over me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Sowers

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam Insole WAY too thick
customer_reviews.text: The foam insert is the problem. It is WAY to thick.When I stand I feel unbalanced due to the foam give. When I sit down my foot is forced into the top of the shoe in a very uncomfortable way. The insert is removed quite easily and replaced with a standard foam insert. THe shoes then feel great. I would give them a 5 but the foam would have been nice. Just not as thick..
customer_reviews.author: Owltown

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a bigger guy 300 + pounds and have bern wearing these shoes for about a month now but have purchased the same model many times before. These k-Swiss shows never fail to impress they have the perfect amount of memory foam and are very durable under my daily use. Very pleased with this purchase and when these wear out I’ll get them again.
customer_reviews.author: dennyray

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for Older Folks
customer_reviews.text: I referee, and these shoes are great. I love K-Swiss since I went to a college that liked them back in the 1980s. If you have K-Swiss, the size and fit should be about the same. For me, they fit well, and will come in handy when the soccer season starts.
customer_reviews.author: Red Sox Fan

customer_reviews.title: The fit and support are just fine like all K-Swiss athletic shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The fit and support are just fine like all K-Swiss athletic shoes I've ever owned. However these are advertized as LEATHER, but are made entirely of man made materials. Specifically the upper is constructed from Synthetic LEATHER (Plastic), which is hot and does not breath like real leather.
customer_reviews.author: Old Cuss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe but beware of mix ups
customer_reviews.text: These are my shoes that I've been wearing for over 20 yrs, they are my go to! Love them. Although this time they sent me the wrong one with black on them instead of the light grey. I'm a white on white guy when it comes to my shoes, I feel they just look so clean. Little disappointed about the mix up. Would be 5 stars except the fact of the mix up with color scheme, this type of shoe is awesome just watch out for human error which is why I deduct 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated: This is the Second Time was Sent Extra Wide in Place of Wide
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the shoe. My problem is with the folks who pick the item off the shelves for shipping. I stipulated a Wide width. I received an Extra Wide. Previously I received a 2XWide. This happened with the last pair and I tried to make-do. Not a great idea--I've been swimming in the shoes and finally decided to give them to Good Will. I am now quite leery of ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: shrinkucci

customer_reviews.title: I wear skechers with memory foam and LOVE them. After wearing them for the entire day
customer_reviews.text: Husband has very wide feet and it's difficult to find his size. After he spent 2 hours searching the internet, I suggested amazon. I found them within 2 minutes! When they arrived, we didn't realize they had the memory foam inside. I wear skechers with memory foam and LOVE them. After wearing them for the entire day, he loves them! Amazon is great because I can reorder them with one click next time he needs them! He's very hard on his shoes so I expect to be placing another order in the fall. GREAT shoes!
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA LIGON

customer_reviews.title: true size
customer_reviews.text: Had not worn KSwiss before and was very pleased that their size 12 was true for me. My feet are on the narrow side and arches flat. I have not had good luck purchasing athletic shoes on line in the past, with what are listed as 12s running way too small or too loose or wide or requiring supplemental inserts. For a long time I used a brand that fit very well and then suddenly it was much too small. When I do have to reorder in the future, it will be KSwiss.
customer_reviews.author: yeesee

customer_reviews.title: New?
customer_reviews.text: Received my pair from Shoe Sensation 101. That is the name on the packing slip. No manufacturer box or tags. Makes me wonder if they are even new. Honestly I would like a refund but don't feel like I should be responsible for all the extra bulls#$t involved with a return. Love the shoes, my second pair. Just very disappointed with the experience this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wilshire

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: True to fit for me and wide as expected. I just bought double wide adidas and they are too narrow. Unfortunately there is not a standard for width. I should never deviate from this K Swiss shoe. The only down side is the durability of the bottom. I chew them up pretty fast on the pickle ball court
customer_reviews.author: Steven O.

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable durable training shoes that is the best tennis shoe I’ve played in.
customer_reviews.text: I play hardcourt tennis and shop for “bargain” tennis shoes. For the most part the uppers look good but the soles have worn so thin my feet are hot. Real leather that I first laced up, then stepped into the shower until they were soaked the word on a long walk. They became my custom tennis shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe shrunk over time
customer_reviews.text: I've had these shoes since March of 2019. I've been using them as a work shoe for my Security job. When I first got them, they were good. The first time I wore them in the rain is when they started to get uncomfortable. I'd take them off friday and fight to get them back on Monday morning because the fabric they used would shrink. It says it 100% Leather, but I never had a leather shoe do that before. Today, the temp was 10° F outside and when I started to walk in the cold, the shoe just ripped from the sole. I've never had so many weather related problems with a shoe before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tennis training shoe
customer_reviews.text: This tennis shoe is great. I had hip surgery almost 2 years ago and knee surgery last April 2016 and these training shoes are fantastic. Awesome cushioning and the tread softens your tennis steps. I am just getting back into tennis and these tennis training shoes are doing a marvelous job. If you have back problems, hip problems and knee problems these are the shoes to purchase for just walking, running or playing tennis again. I am 72 years old and these shoes made me young again on the tennis court.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Hello!?
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had bought new shoes. Inside the shoes is what looks like animal hair and someone wore dark socks because there was sock lint inside the shoe at the heal. Bottom of soles were slightly dirty. Outside of the shoes was a crease. Shoes were already laced. Obvious these were not brand new. I paid for brand new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Thornley

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: They need to go back to quality not quantity the memory foam has no arch support and the sole fell off the last 2 pair after just a few months. I bought kswiss because of the awesome arch support they had. Then they went cheap and put in memory foam and still changed the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa demerle

customer_reviews.title: Three pairs of second-rate shoes
customer_reviews.text: Because I couldn't find these shoes in stores, when I saw them on Amazon, I ordered three pairs. The left shoe is fine, but in all three right shoes, the insole stops an inch from the end of the shoe. This is very uncomfortable. K-swiss has been my go-to shoes because they're stylish, lightweight, and always fit. This was an expensive let down!
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Hard to re-Lace.
customer_reviews.text: If you decide to replace the laces be careful on the first eyelets (not the very first eyelets in the center but the ones on the side) they were really hard to rethread with new laces. I use lock laces (black and white) and on the silver and white kswiss they look clean.
customer_reviews.author: Oso.True

customer_reviews.title: Worst shoe I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning these today! These shoes couldn’t be more uncomfortable. I’m a nurse and midway I had to remove these to finish. They tear up your feat. I can’t discourage you enough to consider these for your feet
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: No longer the original Indonesian leather, Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: Not my old Indonesian leather shoes with arch support. These are made in China, plastic feeling leather, no arch support and too narrow in the toe. I'm sending them back without putting them both on.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: The fit is true to size
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his shoes.Helikes how they fit also the way they look on his feet. He has a gray pair.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great style K-Swiss shoe (ST-329)
customer_reviews.text: Great style K-Swiss shoe (ST-329). Now with all the great color combos, I'll never stop buying this shoe. Over 10yrs., and, all purchases which have not been totally worn out, are still going strong. Excellent comfort with minor break-in if at all. Great for casual or every day use. I mostly use mine daily and, I find, they've lasted me quite some time before I have to purchase a new pair(I sometimes buy an extra pair just because I enjoy the style that much). Most of the time I replace because of excessive wear and scuff, not because the shoe doesn't last. Hope K-Swiss never discontinues this line, and, Amazon continues to offer as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaaay better than Nike.
customer_reviews.text: I buy new shoes every 2-3 years, K swiss has been my goto for the past decade. Always fit just right and comfortable out of the box. In fact my old pair becomes my housework shoes until the next new pair so I get 4-6 years out of them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dopp

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I have owned in a while!
customer_reviews.text: I love K-Swiss I did not expect the memory foam in the past I have had issues but I have worn these shoes every day since I got them. They are comfortable, they fit as expected, and they are the best shoes I have had in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic31159

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pair of KSwiss, pristine
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected( 2 days) KSwiss came in original box, no damage, opened and shoes were in pristine condition. As if no one had even opened the box yet. I took both shoes out and they were flawless..... Bad to the bone look, beautiful pair of shoes. Trying them on , I slipped my foot inside and my comment was “ AHH”. I purchased the all white 10 1/2 W and I’m thinking about buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Samiliano

customer_reviews.title: Not what they use to be
customer_reviews.text: I remember my first pair of k-swiss, they reminded me of the most comfortable shoe I've ever worn, rebock high tops 30 years ago. I used to like these shoes so much that the last time i bought 2 pair because you know how hard it is to find nice shoes nowadays. Anyways, glad i only bought one pair. The only thing that makes these shoes feel like the ones of 10 years ago are brand new socks. Seriously, these are now just barely above the other "s" sneaker when it comes to comfort.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & great deal
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. My husband wears them at his job as an RN in palliative care unit of local hospital. He says they are very comfortable & keep his feet from becoming tired or sore. He ordered another pair as he goes through several pair a year. This is best price We’ve seen
customer_reviews.author: Brenda F. Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Just too much weight in these shoes for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: My adult teen grandson needed these for work. They are just too heavy and caused his feet to hurt. They are a nice, heavy duty, non-slip shoe, but the weight of the shoe is causing me to score it lower.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Baake

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I've worn size 10 in K Swiss before, and Amazon even suggested this size. They were still too small so I returned them. I liked the style but I'll stick to buying shoes in-store. I recommend buying a full size bigger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: AGonzales7

customer_reviews.title: Insoles too short
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of K-Swisse for many years now and they havent let me down yet. The shoes look grate however the insoles are to small for the shoe. The memory foam goes up to my toe pads and then ends which leaves the tips of my toes hanging uncomfortably over and on to jard rubber. Im returning the current pair in hopes thst it is just a one time defect per pair...
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: My hubby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is so damn picky he drives me nuts! He will wear nothing but these K-swiss shoes which are impossible to find in stores and if they have them they never have them in his size. So thank you for carrying these in so many sizes because he will wear nothing else. They are super comfortable for him and he is very flat footed so these provide good arch support for him. He never complains his feet hurt as long as he has his k-swiss on:)
customer_reviews.author: JenDelRio:)

customer_reviews.title: Don't delay-buy this shoe today!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is classy, stylish and it speaks of fashion sophistication. The color is unique, and can be worn with casual or dressy attire. K-Swiss stands alone in the shoe world, and demands the highest respect. And this seller rocks too! I will be purchasing from them again. You simply cannot go wrong in choosing to adorn your feet with ST-329's.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Veston, Minister

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes made by unscrupulous country.
customer_reviews.text: I have exclusively worn these shoes for work for three years. My job consists of walking routes and I usually have to replace my shoes every year. Unfortunately, I need to replace my shoes and I discovered that K-Swiss has been manufacturing their shoes in China. In fact, I found out that a Chinese company has bought K-Swiss in 2019. After the actions that the government of China had taken regarding the Coronavirus, I refuse to support any company that manufactures products in China.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I have had.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of K-Swiss. I usually get them from a store in my area, but, they did not have any of my preferred styles this time so I searched online and found this pair on amazon. I love them, this is my first pair with memory foam insoles and they were comfortable as soon as I put them on. I wore them to work the next day without breaking them in first but i had no trouble. My feet and legs felt wonderful after 10 hours on the concrete warehouse floor.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Spinks

customer_reviews.title: Edit Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: Below is my original post. 4 months and a week later my right shoe has a huge tear on the right side. That's the quickes a pair of shoes has gone in years. They look nice and feel good but that doesn't make up for such a short lifespan. Good quality and comfortable shoes. This is a rare shoe that needed no break in period to fight right. Plus keeps my feet dry which is s big plus. Not too mention they look good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marinenko

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with style!
customer_reviews.text: I love them and use them daily as my walking shoes. Even though they're a tad tighter around the sides than preferred, they're still not PUMA tight. Puma has crazy tight shoes, which is why I stopped wearing them. If you're in the market for comfortable shoes, then these should rank high on your list! I love them! The best part? They look amazing as well! Seldom is comfort paired so well with style!
customer_reviews.author: Juan A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe, but needs a better insole!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe!!! I wear for my nursing jobs. It’s hard to find all leather, good looking nursing shoes. The only negative is the memory foam insole is sewn in, and compresses flat fast so shoes seems to have no cushioning. Feet are sore before end of shift. I’m looking for thin insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam cause odor?
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly, shoes look good exactly as pictured. I think they are a little narrow for my feet. I'm not sold on the memory foam. Never had a problem with odorous feet before, I don't know if the memory foam soaks it up or what but these shoes don't smell very good after working in them all day. That would be expected if I had ever had this problem before but my other K-Swiss without memory foam don't cause an odor. Other than that I am enjoying them. Just putting some baby powder and dryer sheets in them when I'm done wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Dye issue
customer_reviews.text: Would give better review of the dye hasn't been leaving color on my feet since second day never got wet or anything....ive been using kswiss for 10 years and o my issue I've had and this pair is already falling apart after a month last one I got I had 3 years
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Like my 10th pair
customer_reviews.text: I am a registered nurse and tattoo artist. I spend a lot of time on my feet. I've been buying this exact shoe style for years. Soooo comfortable. Pair the shoe with some protalus inserts and you literally have the perfect shoe for being on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: DTrueblood.FleshwoundTattoo

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable for long days on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nurse in NYC, and I take public transit almost everyday, so I’m usually on my feet for about 15+ hours a day. I was looking for some comfortable walking shoes, and my hospital requires white shoes, so I thought these might work. They’re really not as comfortable as I was hoping. I’ve only had these shoes for about 3 weeks, but I’ve already noticed that my feet really start to ache after the first 3-4 hours of wearing these shoes. By the time I get home, I really have to take these off and rest my feet. My heels feel especially sore. Not the shoes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss hits a home run with this shoe!!! ....and it comes in Wide Widths!!! Bravo K-Swiss!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these K-Swiss training shoes. I just rediscovered K-Swiss after a few years. These surpass anything K-Swiss had out a few years ago. And, they come in wide widths!!! Thank you K-Swiss!!!!! Hopefully Amazon will get on the ball and get more in stock. Almost all the K-Swiss brands are either out of stock or out of the most popular sizes. Please restock soon so I can get another pair or two in different colors. Great shoe, Amazing Fit and good value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kenyon Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I work as a RN in a nursing home. I walk quit a bit. These shoes are very comfortable. Fit correctly. When these wear out I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SHOR ON THE MARKET!!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this particular shoe and it always meets and exceeds my expectations! I am thus far happy with this order. I am still “breaking them in” but they seem to fit as hopes for! In fact, ordered another pair in lil different color today! Love the KSwiss ST329!! Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes for the man that destroys shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great casual sneaker! We have bought this exact pair twice because the first pair lasted my husband forever. He works a job he is on his feet 12 Hours a day on concrete floors that regularly gets his shoes wet. These kswiss keep his feet dry and the padding doesn't break down like most his shoes. They have great traction so he doesn't slip all while keeping his feet supported and comfortable. He usually ruins shoes every 2 months but not with these. The look great! go great with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Not New
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this brand for 18yrs. These fit the same as usual. I am disappointed when opened the box I seen they had been worn. One shoe had definitely been tried on and dirty on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Mustanglover

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss are a good brand for me as their shoes usually fit my ...
customer_reviews.text: K-Swiss are a good brand for me as their shoes usually fit my feet better than most. These are a tiny bit narrower than previous K-Swiss I've owned but still perfectly comfortable for my feet. I would however suggest to others that, if your feet are a little toward the wide size, definitely go for a wider fit.
customer_reviews.author: MomentaryMadness

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on pillows
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I recommend them if you want I nice pair of white leather sneakers. Very comfortable with memory foam inners makes for great walking and standing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Napieraj

customer_reviews.title: I think this could be a wonderful shoe, if I can find a 12 that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this shoe for 7 to 8 years. This would be my 4th pair. 10.5 D. Always. Not now. What did you do to these shoes? Just stuff a giant insert into it? Which they did. 10.5, too small and narrow. Ok. Try an 11 D, too narrow in the toe. Really?? I think this could be a wonderful shoe, if I can find a 12 that doesn't slip off the heal. Sending back another pair. Will go back to Fila if this one fails. Trying an 11 EE. WTH! Nope. 11.5 EE. Unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Greg b

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I Wear My K Swiss... Fit perfect and like a glove. Still an amazing shoe that is still stylish. Well for me anyway. You can't keep a classic down.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for my 12 hour shifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work (I'm a nurse and work 12 hour shifts) and these shoes have been a blessing. I can really feel the cushion of the memory foam and it really, really makes a difference when I'm on my feet for 12 hours. These were my first pair of K-Swiss but they won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: T. Zajch

customer_reviews.title: Pearly Whites
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes ,they are very comfortable and look great. Definitely real k-swiss , very satisfied..update 5/14 /20 still satisfied bought another pair and no one else had them available not even SHOE CITY
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Flores

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy them again...
customer_reviews.text: terrible shoes... I wear these for work (I sit at a machine in a cleean room) within a month the soles started to come apart from the uppers. don't know if it was a fluke pair but wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love a good shoe that supports my feet and back. kswiss does that in this style of shoe. Yes it's a men's shoe (women's same style) but the support is what I was looking for as well as comfort. So paying $70+ for these was definitely worth it. Besides Amazon is on their game,I recieved them 3 days early
customer_reviews.author: Farrah  Miller

customer_reviews.title: A Classic.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, nice looking classic. Been buying the ST329 for many years. Wear a summer or two then rotate them into work-around-the-house duty when it’s time for a new pair. Rarely have I had a pair break down in the arch support - maybe once or twice after very heavy use. I keep coming back. The leather (white) cleans easily and always responds well to a degreasing hand cleaner or a white liquid shoe polish.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Incorvati

customer_reviews.title: Low quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've had 7 pairs of these shoes. They are my favorite but never seem to last more than 6 month if worn daily. They look great but are really terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fast Service!
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying K-Swiss for it seems like forever. First time for the red. Usually I buy the Siver. It really does not matter- they are always a great purchase. Fit is good. Size is good. Service is excellent. Would like to try all colors or all styles.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Nagle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide toe box, and a narrow heel. These shoes fit my arch perfectly. I keep a supply in my closet, for when the old ones wear out.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: I'll but them as long as they make them 2
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit, feel and durability of this model of K Swiss XT's. I have purchased several pairs of them in white over the last 10 - 15 years and have always purchased replacement pairs ahead of time to ensure that I would have this model available when something caused the pair that I was wearing to become unserviceable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna W. Fouty

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable and durable shoes. They have a gel insoles.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my choice of K-Swiss ST329 shoes. I have been wearing these to work for two month's now. They are comfortable and are durable. They have a very short break in time. I am a large man, 6ft. 3in. 290lbs, and put a lot of stress on my shoes. These have held up well for me. I had to buy a black shoes for work, but I will likely buy some of these same shoes in white in the near future. I think the peacoat/white model look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes but they feel a little heavy and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes but they feel a little heavy and not as flexible as some other sneakers. I walk a lot and in that category they excel, no foot pain, not back pain, they are great. For the reasons above I did not give them a 5* rating but they are worth the 4* and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: RicksOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I chose this shoe because I know how good K-Swiss shoes are, have been wearing them for over 20 years. I chose to use this company to purchase from because of the great offer and reasonable price. The shoe size ended up being to small but with that being said their was nothing wrong with the fact the shoe is still of great quality. I received my shoes within the expected time frame. I recommend using this company and will use them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: So far So good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult for me to find shoes that fit well. Men’s shoes and sneakers seem to be made for narrower feet than mine. I saw the Black came in wide so I went for it. First time wearing them today. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kaine

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves these!!! Very nice! Last along time, his previous pair of these lasted almost 3 years! Would recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable. They wear well,mile after mile.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand and style of walking shoe. I've made this purchase many times. Always K-Swiss st329(white) Very affordable. In addition, I always use Rexall Men's Ultra Work insoles. A perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers ever! I must have bought 20 pairs of these in my life! They don't wear out just get dirty and old looking after a while, then I use them to mow the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pair of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable pair of sneakers, great fit for the price. They are easy to clean. Would have given them a five star rating but they don't have memory foam insoles which I would have preferred. they are very comfortable nonetheless. Would buy another pair. The thread on the bottom is also very good for better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Tigersoul

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my son, I've always known quality and durability of this product. And they still have it, probably one of the best or probably the best white shoes ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Remelu Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for work in the operating room and I have no issues whatsoever with fit and comfort. I came across with an article which includes this as one of the recommended pairs of shoes in my line of work.
customer_reviews.author: pajjap

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneaker but order a size up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a replacement for my Classic VN’s. I ordered my usual size 11 Medium but the toe box was EXTREMELY snug. I believe this is due to the thicker than normal memory foam insert and the thick cushion underneath the tongue. With a proper fit these would be super comfortable sneakers with good support and a great look. ( reason for the 5 star rating) but I recommend ordering a full size up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Begley

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite style of K-Swiss so I can order them from Amazon with confidence that they are going to fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: As good as the first pair I bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these that I bought and I'm very pleased with my purchase. They have more style than most black tennis shoes but still provide the needed comfort for walking. An added benefit is that eyelets are hidden for a little better look but still very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, looks great, break in period doesn't take too long and seems to last a good while. I added a few coats of waterproofing spray when I got them, and after each cleaning to keep them white.
customer_reviews.author: D. Needham

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These K-Swiss are my favorite shoes very comfortable and the only ones I will buy!!! I definitely would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Swartz

customer_reviews.title: These are the shoes you need.
customer_reviews.text: I had already tried to shoes on at the store, and I already knew what I was looking for. The memory foam is amazing. And the price was less than the $75 dollars at the local outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Stitching Problem
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sneaker but some flaws. Around the outer edge of the sneaker by the ankle, the leather that is stitched together leaves a knot which when worn irritated my ankle and hurt, leaving an almost type of burn mark on my ankle. Now I don't know if it was just this pair, but I did not take a chance on getting another pair. Too bad to, cause I really like the look of these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: JacMatMaz

customer_reviews.title: Best, most comfortable shoes out there!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. They are so comfortable, and the memory foam is great. I actually enjoy wearing shoes now! The only concern I had was that I wear short socks (below my ankle) and for the first few days the shoes rubbed on my ankles, but that was my own fault. They're broken in now and I'm back to wearing my ankle socks. Still comfortable as ever. Will definitely purchase these again
customer_reviews.author: Quiksilver2101

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Husband has wide feet and tennis shoes usually pinch his feet, he loved these from the first time he put them on and have lasted.
customer_reviews.author: RockinMimi

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 10 pair and I love them !! To be 6ft 1 and 300lbs and love the shoes is a rare thing !!
customer_reviews.author: terry knight

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: They look an feel all good when u get them but there built cheap the bottom of the shoe has been comming apart so I got scissors an cut stuff off an then I went to tie them an there so cheap the lace pulled right apart if these were 20 bucks I'd say great deal I've only worn them 12 times an they fell apart
customer_reviews.author: Janell medeiros

customer_reviews.title: A perfect match to the identical white pair of K-SWISS I already own.  Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Local stores couldn't find this brand/model in black and in my size (wide feet!). These are comfy / cozy and fit perfectly. This is what the Internet excels at.
customer_reviews.author: Re Vue

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Looks are great, large for me. I bought 8.5 wide US. Maybe 8 would work. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: M RANKIN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, pour quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought shoes in August of 2019 its April of 2020 and they already fallen apart didn't last 6 months. The shoe separating from the sole
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a very wide foot and order the wide foot version. It's nicely roomy and KSwiss always look great. 2nd pair for me
customer_reviews.author: Mornico71

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be Full Grain. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I used to sell Kswiss, and it's been a shoe I have always enjoyed wearing, it's snug and fits my width well , stiff but breaks in nicely after a month or 2 of extended wear this model should be very durable, because the leather is full grain! So far I am happy with the price and product.
customer_reviews.author: rocketred

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with K Swiss. If they will survive my boys they will survive yours
customer_reviews.author: Mark Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneaker, I like everything about them. I plan on buying them again when I need another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to get the correct size they differ to other brands.
customer_reviews.text: If you buy these shoes make sure to order a size smaller. My fiance wears a 13 wide in pumas and Nike and I ordered a 13 wide in these beautiful shoes which he loved but they were a whole size too big so I had to return them, pay for shipping and reorder them.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee H

product_meta.title: K-Swiss Women's St329 CMF Sneaker
product_meta.description: The St329 sneaker was the original tennis training shoe developed by K-Swiss, and has since become a cult-classic. Designed and built to last, this staple sneaker showcases a durable rubber outsole, sturdy tread, and maximum comfort with a k-eva cushioned midsole and premium memory footbed.
